references.paper_title: Probabilistic circuits: A unifying framework for tractable probabilistic models
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of probabilistic circuits, which are a core concept in the current paper.

references.paper_title: On the latent variable interpretation in sum-product networks
references.reason: This paper discusses the latent variable interpretation in sum-product networks, which are related to the probabilistic integral circuits discussed in the current work.

references.paper_title: Einsum networks: Fast and scalable learning of tractable probabilistic circuits
references.reason: This paper introduces Einsum networks, a type of tractable probabilistic circuit that is compared to the methods in this paper.
This paper presents methods for regularizing probabilistic circuits, a key aspect of training discussed in the current work.

references.paper_title: Scaling up probabilistic circuits by latent variable distillation
references.reason: This paper introduces a technique for scaling up probabilistic circuits that is relevant to the methods explored in the current work.
